short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to share your desktop in conjunction with supported NewTelco services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used with some of the NewTelco services to share your desktop and presentations to the other participants in your conferencing session.
